values.value: Implement a consent management system to record, track, and manage data subject consent for personal data processing. GDPR requires demonstrable proof that consent was freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous.

Configure Salesforce Individual object and Contact consent fields to capture granular consent preferences per processing purpose. Record the timestamp, source, and version of the privacy notice at the time consent was given. Build flows to process consent withdrawal requests and halt processing within 30 days. Implement audit logging on all consent record modifications to maintain an evidence trail.
